Guaranteed Progress

with Kaplan Intensive English courses

Advance at least one level every 10 weeks

Find out more

Be confident in how much English you will learn

Studying English abroad is an investment in your future, so we want to assure you that it is a sensible investment that will get you to where you need to be.

You will advance at least one level of English fluency every 10 weeks on a course that offers Guaranteed Progression. All students are placed in their classes using our adaptive KITE test as well as an initial consultation with one of our teachers. After that, students are tested every 10 weeks to see if they can progress to the next level. The KITE test adapts to your skill level and measures your progress as you study English to ensure you benefit from a fully tailored learning experience.

If you don’t improve by at least one level every 10 weeks, but have attended all your classes and completed all your homework assignments, then we will stand behind our methods by giving you four weeks of free tuition to get you to that next level.

How we teach

Our immersive courses plunge you into the living language.
Learn through expert tuition, unique study materials, and fun excursions in a fascinating English-speaking culture

0-10 weeks

Beginner

You know a few simple words and phrases, but you have a very small vocabulary and can only communicate basic needs.

10-20 weeks

Elementary

You have some understanding of grammar and a growing functional vocabulary. You can speak and write basic sentences.

20-30 weeks

Lower Intermediate

You can participate in simple conversations, read longer texts and write short compositions.

30-40 weeks

Intermediate

You can participate fully in more complex conversations, read more advanced texts and write a simple essay.

40-50 weeks

Higher Intermediate

You can handle most social and professional situations, explain complex thoughts fluently, and understand the general themes of radio and TV broadcasts.

50+ weeks

Advanced

You can read demanding texts and handle long, in-depth discussions. You can understand and express subtle shades of meaning. You are very close to using the language like a native speaker.

Exam Levels

Where Guaranteed Progression is offered

Courses and locations you can benefit from this

We offer Guaranteed Progression on the following Kaplan English courses:

Intensive English courses of 10 weeks or more
Intensive Academic Year courses
Intensive Academic Semester courses
The Intensive Academic Year - Best of America program

Guaranteed Progress is available in all of our English schools in US, UK, Ireland and Canada. We guarantee progression in fluency levels on the condition that students have a 95% attendance rate, complete all of their homework assignments and do not display any behavioural issues.

If you wish to know more, please read the full terms and conditions.
